text: Banchhada (or Banchada) is a tribe in central India that is traditionally identified with prostitutionhttps://interactive.aljazeera.com/aje/2020/india- highway-shame/index.html and other crimes. They are listed as a Scheduled Caste for the purposes of India's reservation system and were formerly classified as a criminal tribe in the British Raj era. The Banchhada are located in the states of Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan. ==References== Category:Ethnic groups in India Category:Scheduled Castes of Madhya Pradesh Category:Denotified tribes of India Category:Scheduled Castes of Rajasthan Category:Prostitution in India
title: Banchhada
